entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 08:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over southern sections late this morning and this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over southern sections. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over southern sections in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
